The only one remaining with a limestone cap...imagine how it would've looked if the whole thing was there!

The tip of this pyramid still has the limestone layer intact. This is how all of the 3 pyramids would have been before time took its toll on them and caused wear and tear. Not difficult to imagine them in their full glory and grandeur.
